summary: The Defense Department offers the SkillBridge program to service members who are transitioning back to civilian life. The program allows them to participate in a civilian job and job training up to 180 days before they leave military service. About 12,000 service members participated in the first half of FY 2024. The services reported that 83% were enlisted personnel. However, the services don't consistently collect...
title: Transition to Civilian Life: Better Collection and Analysis of Military Service Data Needed to Improve Oversight of the SkillBridge Program
